channel.title: Build on The Fuzzy Spork
channel.description: Recent content in Build on The Fuzzy Spork

item.title: On deployments and distribution
item.description: Ever since I started programming, I’ve been fascinated with what you can do with a codebase - not just the act of programming, but building and deploying it as well. For a programming company, the less time programmers have to work on building or deploying their code, the more productive they can be. The automation of these things can have a huge benefit.
